Action: move robot arm to its Home pose
move robot arm to its Sleep pose
increase gripper pressure in 0.125 step increments (max is 1)
decrease gripper pressure in 0.125 step increments (min is 0)
reverses the Right Stick Left/Right control
move the end-effector (defined at 'ee_gripper_link') vertically in Cartesian space
move the end-effector (defined at 'ee_gripper_link') horizontally in Cartesian space
reverses the Left Stick Left/Right control
if the arm has 6dof, this moves the end-effector in a negative direction along its own 'y' axis
if the arm has 6dof, this moves the end-effector in a positive direction along its own 'y' axis
